price: 30. Gexaay iraawita jahannam giráh qiiriy sidiica luddalê fanah.
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
